F1_Q_INCONVENIENCE.title: Operator Inconvenience
F1_Q_INCONVENIENCE.question: The deficiency was an inconvenience to the operator and the SUT could be changed or modified in a manner that would improve operations for the operator?

F1_INFO_RECOMMENDATION.title: Treat as Recommendation
F1_INFO_RECOMMENDATION.body:
Treat as recommendation.
Recommendations can be written to the program office to improve SUT use in the fleet, or written to the fleet to identify work arounds for SUT operations.

F1_Q_SUPPORT_SYSTEM.title: Support System
F1_Q_SUPPORT_SYSTEM.question: The deficiency was on a support system (i.e. tech-manual tools, parts, materials, supply system, etc.)?

F1_Q_ADDITIONAL_WORK.title: Additional Operator Work
F1_Q_ADDITIONAL_WORK.question: Did the deficiency induce additional work or cause the operator to perform tasks that add additional man-hours or steps that were not previously identified in the development phase?

F1_INFO_OPCON.title: Treat as Operational Consideration (OPCON)
F1_INFO_OPCON.body:
Treat as an operational consideration (OPCON).
The OPCON should identify how the deficiency affects the operation of the system, and how the operator can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

F1_Q_COMMANDER_MANEUVER.title: Commander Maneuver / Unit Operation
F1_Q_COMMANDER_MANEUVER.question: Did the deficiency require the commander to maneuver, or operate their unit or force in a specific manner to ensure mission success?

F1_INFO_TACON.title: Treat as Tactical Consideration (TACON)
F1_INFO_TACON.body:
Treat as a Tactical Consideration (TACON).
The TACON should identify how the deficiency affects the operational mission, and the tactical considerations for the commander which can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_OR_TACTIC.title: Requirement / Tactic Listed
F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_OR_TACTIC.question: Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD or a tactic listed in a TTP or CONOP?

F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCURRED_NON_SUPPORT.title: Derived Requirement Concurrence
F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCURRED_NON_SUPPORT.question: Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?

F1_Q_DATA_OP_QUANT.title: Data Characterization (Quantitative)
F1_Q_DATA_OP_QUANT.question: Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?

F1_INFO_DATA_OP_QUAL.title: Characterize Data Qualitatively
F1_INFO_DATA_OP_QUAL.body: The data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

F1_HANDOFF_F2_OMF.title: Handoff: Determine if Deficiency is an OMF

handoff.reason: Determine if the deficiency is an OMF.
handoff.reference: Refer to Figure 2 sheet 1 for OMF determination.

F1_HANDOFF_F2_OMF.body: Proceed to Figure 2 (Failure Type / OMF determination).

F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_REFERENCE.title: Requirement Reference Document
F1_Q_DIRECT_REQ_REFERENCE.question: Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD, Life Cycle Sustainment Plan, or system publication, PMS, or other SUT reference Document?

F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCURRED_SUPPORT.title: Support System Derived Requirement Concurrence
F1_Q_DERIVED_REQ_CONCURRED_SUPPORT.question: Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?

F1_INFO_REQUEST_CONCURRENCE_BLUE.title: Request Concurrence / Generate Blue Sheet
F1_INFO_REQUEST_CONCURRENCE_BLUE.body:
Request concurrence from the resource sponsor on the derived requirement.

Generate a Blue sheet for the identified deficiency.
(Refer to Figure 2 sheet 1 for OMF determination.)
On the Blue sheet state 'awaiting resource sponsor concurrence'.

Generate Results paragraph that describes the deficiency.

F1_END_AWAITING_CONCURRENCE.title: Outcome: Awaiting Resource Sponsor Concurrence
F1_END_AWAITING_CONCURRENCE.body: Process complete for this path: request concurrence and generate Blue Sheet marked awaiting concurrence.

F1_Q_DATA_EFFECT_QUANT.title: Deficiency Effect Data (Quantitative)
F1_Q_DATA_EFFECT_QUANT.question: Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?

F1_INFO_DATA_EFFECT_QUAL.title: Characterize Effect Data Qualitatively
F1_INFO_DATA_EFFECT_QUAL.body: The data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

F1_HANDOFF_F4_QUANT_BASELINE.title: Handoff: Quantitative Baseline Flow

handoff.reason: Determine Operational Impact and Mission Criticality using quantitative baseline flow.
handoff.reference: Refer to the Quantitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 4 sheet 3 of 4).

F1_HANDOFF_F4_QUANT_BASELINE.body: Proceed to Figure 4 quantitative baseline flow (sheet 3 of 4).

F1_HANDOFF_F3_QUAL_BASELINE.title: Handoff: Qualitative Baseline Flow

handoff.reason: Determine Operational Impact and Mission Criticality using qualitative baseline flow.
handoff.reference: Refer to the Qualitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 3 sheet 3 of 4).

F1_HANDOFF_F3_QUAL_BASELINE.body: Proceed to Figure 3 qualitative baseline flow (sheet 3 of 4).
